transcript:
Customer: Ab mujhko mera ehsas nahi.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: A.N. Plastic se baat kar rahe hain sir?
Executive: Haan ji haan.
Executive: Sir, good afternoon. Main Juhi baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART se. Actually sir, ek concern open hua tha abhi aapka video meeting ke liye.
Customer: Haan ji madam.
Executive: To koi issue aa raha hai services mein?
Customer: Haan madam, kuch dikkat hai. Mere ko kuch mein jankari chahiye madam. Kuch tenders hai jo aa rahe hain, usko use kaise karte hain, usko apply kaise karna hai, ye mere ko jankari chahiye.
Executive: Achcha, tenders ke liye aapko information chahiye thi aap?
Customer: Haan ji madam.
Executive: To sir, aap jabhi bhi tenders consume karne ke liye jaate honge, waha par already saare details rehte hain. Jabhi bhi aap tender consume karenge na.
Customer: Nahi, usme jaise kuch tenders aise hain, jo ki aise number mil jaate hain direct. Usme wo sab aata nahi hai. Usme tenders aate hain ki iski validity, bidding karna hai to hota kaise hai, wo ye jaanna hai. Wo aap batayenge na kaise apply karte hain, kaise.
Executive: Sir, nahi, wo dekhiye wo IndiaMART ke end se nahi hota hai. Hamare yaha pe jo bhi recently tenders update hote hain market mein, theek hai?
Hmm.
Executive: Wo hamare yaha pe show hote hain. Aap yaha se tender consume karke ye aapko apni site pe le jaate hain. Aapko wahin se tender dalna padta hai. Aapko form fill karna padta hai, jo bhi documents mangte hain, wo documents submit karne padte hain.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: To yahi information aapko chahiye thi bas?
Customer: Ye sahi chahiye tha. Usko use kaise karte hain wo humse ho nahi pa raha hai. Wahi jaanna tha. Ab aap keh rahe ho aap batao.
Executive: Dekhiye jo view, main batati hu. View tender information mein jab aap click karoge na tender consume karne ke liye.
Hmm.
Executive: To jab aap us tender pe click karke tender consume karte ho to sir wo aapko automatically us website pe le jaata hai jaha se tender post hua hota hai.
Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai? Waha jaake jo bhi documents submit hote hain, aap wo documents submit kar dijiye. Wo aapko batata hai unko ye ye documents ka requirement hai.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Aur uske baad fir wo log aapko contact karte hain agar wo sahi lagta hai unko to.
Customer: Theek hai ji.
Executive: Theek hai? Rest iske alawa kuch aur?
Customer: Nahi aur kuch nahi.
Executive: Theek hai. Main ye concern aapka close kar du abhi agar aapka issue resolve hua hai to?
Customer: Kar do madam. Ab aap usko karwaoge nahi to aapke end se aayega hi nahi to fir kya matlab? Kar do.
Executive: Theek hai. Main isko sir close kar deti hu. Aapke paas mein na feedback aayega. Usko please positive feedback de dijiyega.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Needs information on how to use tenders.



Resolution:

- Explained the process of consuming tenders.



Next Steps: 

- Issue resolved.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- tenders, information, application process, website
